title: A defence of the Apologie of the Churche of Englande conteininge an answeare to a certaine booke lately set foorthe by M. Hardinge, and entituled, A confutation of &c. By Iohn Iewel Bishop of Sarisburie.
author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
publisher: In Fleetestreate, at the signe of the Elephante, by Henry VVykes,
